decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: Location Plan; 01 (Existing Floor Plans); 02 (Existing and Proposed Front and Side Elevations); 03 (Existing and Proposed Rear and Side Elevations); 04 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan); 05 (Proposed Block Plan).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4 & 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan DPD (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18).
| No part of the flat roof of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with Policies 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18).
